channel.title: macOS on Dick Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in macOS on Dick Johnson

item.title: Practice2 1.03 Released for macOS
item.description: Version 1.03 of Practice2, was approved and released for macOS today What’s new Listen to music, or play along to tracks during your practice session. Choose a playlist to listen to during your session. You can chose a different playlist for each session which is saved for future use. Fixed a few bugs New App landing page https://practice2app.firewerkz.dev Use split screen to follow along with another app, like a song book, or guitar tabs All the best, Dick.

item.title: TimetoGo2 now available for macOS
item.description: TimetoGo2 is now available for macOS Simple Time to Go macOS App. Calculates weeks and days from today to selected dates in the future or past. Includes a lead time date for a given numbers of week from today. Simple. What’s new First macOS release All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.02 Released for macOS
item.description: Version 1.02 of Practice2, was approved and released for macOS today What’s new Added configurable time, session phase ending indication. Phase colour turns to yellow Added introduction replay option in setting Fixed a few bugs Use split screen to follow along with another app, like a song book, or guitar tabs All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.01 Released for macOS
item.description: Practice2 release for macOS What’s new Added auto reset if session has ended and start is pressed. Add short app intro. Fixed a few bugs. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.0 Released for macOS
item.description: Practice2 release for macOS A simple practice session timer. For example, use it for guitar practice or a health workout session. Create sessions for different purposes and different durations. Share sessions across devices. Share sessions with friends. All the best, Dick.
